title: My experience
description: Received an email from a supposed Nigerian prince who claimed to have a large sum of money stuck in a foreign bank. He asked for a small fee upfront to release the funds. I paid $2500, but the money never materialized. Beware!

title: Phishing attempt
description: Received an email claiming to be from a reputable bank, asking for personal information to update my account. I almost fell for it, but luckily realized it was a scam in time.

title: Investment fraud
description: Received a convincing phone call promoting a 'guaranteed' investment opportunity. I invested $10,000, but the company vanished, and I lost it all.

title: Online shopping deception
description: Ordered a product online, but it never arrived. The seller stopped responding, and I lost $150 in the process.

title: Tech support impostors
description: Received a call from someone claiming to be from a tech support company, saying my computer had a virus. They wanted $300 to 'fix' it, but I realized it was a scam.

title: Lottery fraud
description: Received an email claiming I won a lottery I never entered. They asked for a $2000 'processing fee' to claim my prize. I didn't fall for it.

title: Fake job offer
description: Applied for a job online and was asked to pay $100 for a background check. I paid, but the job never existed.

title: Romantic deception
description: Met someone online who claimed to be in love and needed $5000 for an emergency. I sent the money, but they disappeared.

title: Social media giveaway hoax
description: Clicked on a link claiming I won a prize in a social media giveaway. They asked for a $50 'processing fee,' but it was a scam.

title: Tax refund scam
description: Received a call saying I owed back taxes and needed to pay $800 immediately to avoid legal action. It was a scam, and I didn't pay.

title: Inheritance swindle
description: Received an email claiming I'm the beneficiary of a distant relative's fortune. They asked for $3000 for 'legal fees,' but I realized it was a scam.

title: Fake charity solicitation
description: Received a call asking for a donation to a fake charity. I donated $75, but it was a scam, and the money was lost.

title: Online auction deception
description: Bought an item on an online auction site that turned out to be fake. I paid $120, and the product was worthless.

title: Impersonation scam
description: Received an email from a fake bank asking for account information. I almost fell for it but realized it was a scam in time. No money lost.

title: Online dating deception
description: Met someone on a dating site who turned out to be a scammer. They asked for $3500 for an 'emergency.' I didn't send the money.
